content.task: CRITICAL SECURITY VIOLATION: CI pipeline security scan failing due to hardcoded password in bandit-report.json:1062. Previous session falsely reported CI success when security tests were actually failing. Need immediate security analysis and remediation of this finding plus review of false success reporting practices.
content.context: Security test shows: "password: 'secure_password'" in bandit-report.json. This is blocking CI pipeline but was incorrectly dismissed as "minor issue" in previous session. Need to determine if this is legitimate security concern or false positive, and implement proper remediation. Also review compliance enforcement gaps.
